name: Spicy Sausage Pasta
instruction: 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onion, bell pepper, and garlic to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Stir in the red pepper flakes, oregano, basil, salt, and black pepper.
5. Pour in the crushed tomatoes and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce.
7. Serve the pasta in bowls and top with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
instruction: 1. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper.
2. Add the shrimp to the bowl and toss to coat in the marinade.
3. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the shrimp and marinade to the skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, until the shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes.
5. Serve the shrimp with lemon wedges on the side.

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
instruction: 1. In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, thyme, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
2. Place the chicken in a large resealable bag and pour the marinade over it. Seal the bag and toss to coat the chicken.
3. Marinate the chicken in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours.
4. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
5. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
6. Serve the chicken hot and garnish with additional lemon wedges, if desired.

name: Chickpea Curry
instruction: 1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat.
2. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Stir in the ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, turmeric, cinnamon, pepper, and salt.
4. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
5. Add the chickpeas, tomato puree, and water to the pot.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let cook for 20-25 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
7. Stir in the cilantro and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
8. Serve the curry over rice or with naan bread.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instruction: 1. Cut the beef sirloin into thin strips and season with salt and pepper.
2. Place the flour in a shallow dish and coat the beef strips in the flour.
3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat.
4. Add the beef strips and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
5. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the onion, mushrooms, and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
7. Stir in the beef broth and bring the mixture to a simmer.
8. Add the beef back to the skillet and let cook for an additional 5 minutes.
9. Stir in the sour cream and cook until heated through.
10. Cook the egg noodles according to package instructions.
11. Serve the beef stroganoff over the egg noodles and garnish with fresh parsley.
